sections.paragraph: தேசம், திசை, நாடு, வயல் - பெண்பால் பெயர்ச்சொல்
1. properly, the space lying between two places or limits
2. a region or country; a tract of land
3. land which is plowed or cultivated, ground
Part(s) of speech: Noun Feminine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (பெண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Feminine of a derivative of the base of G5490 through the idea of empty expanse; room, that is, a space of territory (more or less extensive; often including its inhabitants): - coast, county, fields, grounds, land, region. Compare G5117.
